text: The 2016–17 Czech Extraliga season was the 24th season of the Czech Extraliga since its creation after the breakup of Czechoslovakia and the Czechoslovak First Ice Hockey League in 1993. OT, 3:5, 2:5, 1:2 OT) * Piráti Chomutov - BK Mladá Boleslav 3:2 (1:7, 1:6, 5:1, 2:1, 6:1) Play-off final: HC Bílí Tygři Liberec - HC Kometa Brno 0:4 (3:4, 3:4 OT, 0:3, 2:5). HC Kometa Brno has won its first Czech league title (and 12th overall title; first since 1966). ==Relegation== {|cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 95%; text- align: center; border: gray solid 1px; border-collapse: collapse;" width="50%" |- bgcolor=#efefef ! width="20" |Place || width="185" | Team || width="20" | GP || width="20" | W || width="20" | OTW || width="20" | OTL || width="20" | L || width="20" | GF|| width="20" | GA || width="20" | Pts |- align=center bgcolor=ccffcc |1 ||HC Olomouc || 58|| 21|| 7|| 5 || 25 || 144 || 145||82 |- align=center bgcolor=ccffcc |2 ||PSG Zlín || 58 || 18|| 8|| 5|| 27|| 142|| 176|| 75 |- align=center bgcolor=ffcccc |3 ||HC Energie Karlovy Vary ||58|| 17|| 1 || 11|| 29|| 138|| 177|| 64 |- align=center bgcolor=ffcccc |4 ||HC Dynamo Pardubice || 58|| 10|| 7|| 5|| 36|| 145 || 209|| 49 |} == References == == External links == * Czech Category:2016–17 in Czech ice hockey leagues Category:Czech Extraliga seasons
